```{r}
library(stringr)
char1 <- c("Wild","Apple","Donald","May","Avocada") 
factor1 <- factor(char1)
levels(factor1)

char2 <- c("蔡英文","習近平","Donald Trump","蔡頭") 
factor2 <- factor(char2)
levels(factor2)
```

```{r}
jsonlite::fromJSON("https://od.cdc.gov.tw/eic/Day_Confirmation_Age_County_Gender_19CoV.json") -> covid19

```

```{r}

covid19$縣市 <- 
  factor(covid19$縣市)
covid19$性別 <-
  factor(covid19$性別)

```

```{r}

```

```{r}
levels(covid19$縣市)
```

```{r}
) -> population
unlist(population) -> population

```
 
```{r}
population[['新北市']]
```
 
2.留下levels中有的popluation元素
```{r}
levels(covid19$縣市) # 是名稱字串向量

# 由於population元素值有names，可以用`[名稱字串向量]`取出所要的
levels(covid19$縣市) -> levelsInData
```

3.由大排到小(integer可以用sort)
```{r}
population <- sort(population, decreasing=T)   #沒寫就是由小排到大
population
```

4.把名稱取出
```{r}
newLevels <- names(population)
newLevels
```

5.重設levels排序
```{r}
covid19$縣市 <-
  factor(
    covid19$縣市, levels=newLevels
  )

levels(covid19$縣市)
```

##排序年齡
1.取出levels中各年齡層的起始數字
```{r}
level_names <- levels(covid19$年齡層)
startingAges <- stringr::str_extract(
  level_names,
  "^[0-9]+" # regex：開頭的一串數字(10-14取出10)(5/8內容)
)
```

2.改成integer才能排序
```{r}
# 要numerical class排的才一定對
startingAges <- as.integer(startingAges)
names(startingAges) <- level_names
startingAges
```

3.由小排到大
```{r}
sort(startingAges) -> startingAges
```

4.重設
```{r}
covid19$年齡層 <- 
  factor(
    covid19$年齡層, names(startingAges)
  )
levels(covid19$年齡層)
```

(5/8學過的手法))
```{r}
covid19$地區 <- covid19$縣市
levels(covid19$地區)
currentLevels <- levels(covid19$地區)

# 整併
north_regex <- "宜蘭縣|基隆市|[台臺]北市|新北市|桃園市|新竹市|新竹縣"
middle_regex <- "苗栗縣|[台臺]中市|彰化縣|南投縣|雲林縣"
south_regex <-
  "嘉義市|嘉義縣|[台臺]南[縣市]|高雄市|屏東縣|澎湖縣"
east_regex <- "花蓮縣|台東縣"

currentLevels <- str_replace(currentLevels, 
            north_regex, "北部")
currentLevels <- str_replace(currentLevels, 
            middle_regex, "中部")
currentLevels <- str_replace(currentLevels, 
            south_regex, "南部")
newLevels <- str_replace(currentLevels, 
            east_regex, "東部")


levels(covid19$地區) <- newLevels
levels(covid19$地區)
```

```{r}
levels(covid19$年齡層)

# 創造10歲間距的所有可能
start <- seq(5, 55, by=10) # 由5到55，每個值差10的數值向量
end <- seq(14, 64, by=10)
middleLevels <- 
  rep(
    paste0(start,"-",end), 
    each=2) # 每個新間距要2個
newLevels <- c("4", middleLevels, "65+", "65+")

levels(covid19$年齡層) <- newLevels
levels(covid19$年齡層)
```

##levels擴充
```{r}
factor3 <- 
  factor(c("好","好","普通","普通", "好"))
levels(factor3)
factor3[[6]] <- "差"
factor3 # 元素6變NA
```

```{r}
factor3 <- 
  factor(c("好","好","普通","普通", "好"))
levels(factor3)

# 先擴大levels
levels(factor3) <- c(levels(factor3), "差")
levels(factor3)
factor3[[6]] <- "差"
factor3

```
